game.model.AI

Class ComputerMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.model.AI.ComputerMove

  • public class ComputerMove
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing a Chess Move and the corresponding tactical value.
    Author:
    Andreas Nylund, Hanna Granholm

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComputerMove

        public ComputerMove(java.awt.Point startPoint,
            java.awt.Point endPoint,
            int piece)
        Constructor, creating a new move. All tactical value being seen from the black perspective.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - Starting tile of the move.
        endPoint - Ending tile of the move.
        piece - The piece currently at endPoint.

    • Method Detail

      • getMoveValue

        private int getMoveValue(int p)
        Calculates the tactical value of this piece being taken.
        Parameters:
        p - Current piece to be taken.
        Returns:
        The tactical value of this piece.

      • addValue

        public void addValue(double v)
        Adds a value to this move.

        Can be called to add value to a move from consecutive moves.

        Parameters:
        v - Value to be added to this move.

        Gets the value of this move.
